user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Setup and Environment Configuration
epics.summary: Initialize the development environment for the project.
epics.description: Set up the essential tools, frameworks, repositories, and environment configurations required for the project. This includes establishing version control, CI/CD pipelines, and baseline documentation to ensure smooth collaboration among developers and stakeholders.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user login and access control mechanisms.
epics.description: Design and develop an authentication system that supports user registration, login, password recovery, and role-based access control. Ensure security best practices such as encrypted passwords, session management, and token-based authentication are in place.

epics.title: Core Feature Development
epics.summary: Develop main functionalities core to the project’s purpose.
epics.description: Implement the foundational user-facing features that define the project’s unique value proposition. This includes designing the UI/UX components, developing functional logic, and integrating necessary APIs to deliver a seamless end-user experience.

epics.title: Data Management and Integration
epics.summary: Setup data storage, retrieval, and third-party integrations.
epics.description: Design data models, configure database systems, and build APIs to manage application data efficiently. Integrate with external services or platforms as needed to enrich functionality, ensuring performance, scalability, and data consistency.

epics.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
epics.summary: Ensure quality and reliability through automated and manual testing.
epics.description: Develop and execute a comprehensive testing strategy that includes unit tests, integration tests, and UI testing. Implement continuous testing in the CI/CD pipeline to guarantee that all features meet quality standards before release.

epics.title: Deployment and Monitoring
epics.summary: Deploy application and implement monitoring and alert systems.
epics.description: Configure production environments and deploy the final application version. Establish monitoring and logging solutions to track system performance, detect issues early, and ensure optimal uptime. Create alert mechanisms for anomaly detection and incident response.

epics.title: User Feedback and Continuous Improvement
epics.summary: Integrate user feedback mechanisms for iterative enhancement.
epics.description: Collect and analyze user feedback to identify pain points, prioritize improvements, and release regular updates. Implement a continuous improvement process to evolve the product based on actual user behavior and analytics data.

user_stories.title: Initialize Development Environment
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to initialize the development environment, so that I have the essential tools and frameworks needed for the project.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure all tools and frameworks are compatible.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Development environment is set up and accessible to all team members. 2. All necessary tools and frameworks are installed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a clean system, When I follow the setup instructions, Then the development environment should be fully configured.

user_stories.title: Implement User Registration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register, so that I can create an account and access the system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User must provide valid email and password.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can register with email and password. 2. Registration confirmation is sent to the user.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, When they fill in the registration form, Then a new account should be created and a confirmation email sent.

user_stories.title: Implement User Login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in, so that I can access my account and use the system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Login must require registered email and password.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can log in with email and password. 2. Access is granted based on correct credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an existing user, When they provide correct credentials, Then they should be logged in successfully.

user_stories.title: Develop Main User Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive user interface, so that I can navigate and use the system easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: UI must be user-friendly and responsive.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User interface is intuitive and responsive. 2. Users can navigate easily.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user interface is designed, When users interact with it, Then it should be intuitive and responsive.

user_stories.title: Setup Database Systems
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to setup database systems, so that I can store and retrieve data efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Database must be scalable and meet data consistency requirements.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Database system is configured properly. 2. Data can be stored and retrieved efficiently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new database system, When it is configured, Then data should be stored and retrieved efficiently.

user_stories.title: Develop Unit Tests
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to develop unit tests, so that I can ensure code quality and reliability.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Unit tests should cover all core functionalities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Unit tests are developed for all core functionalities. 2. Tests pass successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core functionalities, When unit tests are executed, Then all tests should pass.

user_stories.title: Deploy Final Application
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to deploy the final application, so that users can access the latest version of the product in production.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Application is deployed successfully. 2. There is no downtime.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a deployment plan, When the application is deployed, Then it should be accessible without downtime.

user_stories.title: Collect User Feedback
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to collect user feedback, so that I can identify areas for improvement.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Feedback system should be easy to use.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can provide feedback easily. 2. Feedback is recorded effectively.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a feedback system, When users provide feedback, Then it should be recorded and accessible for analysis.
